definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

place sb on a field of death and he will fight to live (idiom based on Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to fight desperately when confronting mortal danger/fig. to find a way out of an impasse
pinyin: zhi4 zhi1 si3 di4 er2 hou4 sheng1

definition: the young will be redoubtable in the years to come (idiom)/the younger generations will surpass us in time

sentences.english: The legend is that when Leda was fecundated she gave birth to twins.
sentences.chinese: 传说勒达怀孕后生了一对双胞胎。

sentences.english: The ancients cloud "doom to death and then".
sentences.chinese: 古人云“置之死地而后生”。

sentences.english: So can all sink not to live to exasperate for several annuals, those small youth men, .
sentences.chinese: 这么多年，那些小后生们，可都沉不住气了。

sentences.english: Your only dog is the youngster you have at home, just in the early stages of his training.
sentences.chinese: 你仅有的一条狗是家里的后生，还在训练的初阶。

sentences.english: This often exists in a man of sixty more than a boy of twenty.
sentences.chinese: 如此锐气，二十后生而有之，六旬男子则更多见。

sentences.english: Son Nicolae was born a year later.
sentences.chinese: 芮芙卡婚后一年后生下儿子尼可拉。

sentences.english: The Mississippi Valley-type (MVT) lead -zinc deposits are the classic epigenetic hydrothermal ores.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河谷型矿床为后生热液矿床。

sentences.english: I got married at age 24 and had a son a couple years later.
sentences.chinese: 俺24岁时结婚，几年后生了一个儿子。

sentences.english: This latest study focuses on what are called the "epigenetic" mechanisms which can affect whether a gene is expressed or not.
sentences.chinese: 最新研究集中在“后生”机制，该机制影响基因。

sentences.english: Factors determine the lifespan of metazoan animals.
sentences.chinese: 因素决定的寿命后生动物。

sentences.english: I think it is difficult to understand Peking Opera, especially young generation.
sentences.chinese: 我想看得懂京剧是不容易的，尤其对于我们后生。

sentences.english: Owing to its distinct attribute property and old age, this discovery may have epoch—making significance on the study of the evolution of early Metazoa.
sentences.chinese: 对于地球后生动物早期演化的研究具有划时代的意义。

sentences.english: Later I heard some people around, Baotai Metazoan children could hang good.
sentences.chinese: 后来听说周围一些人，保胎后生的宝宝，都挺好的。

sentences.english: The worst but doom to death and beyond.
sentences.chinese: 最差不过置之死地而后生。

definition: mythological daughter of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4] who turned into bird Jingwei 精衛|精卫[Jing1 wei4] after drowning
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
(literary) youngster/(old) young fellow (term of address used by the older generation)/(old) I, me (used in speaking to one's elders)
smell of mother's milk not yet dried (idiom); immature and inexperienced/still wet behind the ears
the younger generation/those who come after
parents of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law/relatives by marriage
sir (respectful form of address for an old man)
